member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LarencyConsoleOptions
member.summary: Options for console latency data exporter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LarencyConsoleOptions.OutputCheckpoints
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to emit latency checkpoint information to the console.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LarencyConsoleOptions.OutputMeasures
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to emit latency measure information to the console.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LarencyConsoleOptions.OutputTags
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to emit latency tag information to the console.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleExtensions
member.summary: Console exporter logging extensions for R9 logger.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleExtensions.AddConsoleExporter(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSection)
member.summary: Adds console exporter as a configuration to the OpenTelemetry ILoggingBuilder.
member.param: Logging builder where the exporter will be added.
The configuration section to bind for customization of the console output.

An action to configure the for console output customization.
member.returns: The instance of to chain the calls.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions
member.summary: Options to configure console logging formatter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.ColorsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether colors are enabled or not.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.DimensionsBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for dimension text background.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.DimensionsColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for dimension text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.DimmedBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for dimmed text background.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.DimmedColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for dimmed text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.ExceptionBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for exception text background.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.ExceptionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for exception text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.ExceptionStackTraceBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for exception stack trace text background.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.ExceptionStackTraceColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating what color to use for exception stack trace text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeCategory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display category.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeDimensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include dimension name/value pairs with each log record.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeExceptionStacktrace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display stack trace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeLogLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display log level.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeScopes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display scopes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeSpanId
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display activity SpanId.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display timestamp.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.IncludeTraceId
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display activity TraceId.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets format string used to format timestamp in logging messages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Console.LoggingConsoleOptions.UseUtcTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not UTC timezone should be used for timestamps in logging messages.
